Description: This house is gorgeous! All new carpet and freshly painted throughout. Enjoy the large front porch. Gas fireplace in the family room that is an open concept floor plan. This has a 2 car garage and 4 nice bedrooms with 3 bathrooms on the upper floor. Ready to move right in! Rent at 2400.00 for a 2 year lease. NO pets or Smoking.
